uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

id.description: The unique ID of the IP Route.

destination.description: Traffic addressed to this IP address or subnet will be routed. Value 0.0.0.0 is used to establish the default gateway.

mask.description: Traffic addressed to this IP address or subnet will be routed. Value 0.0.0.0 is used to establish the default gateway.

ip_route_mode.description: The IP route mode. Wireless devices only support IRM_GATEWAY.

gateway.description: The IP address of the gateway to forward routed traffic to, when IP route mode is IRM_GATEWAY.

destination_vlan.description: The destination VLAN. This is mandatory when IP route mode is IRM_VLAN.

distance.description: The administrative distance to associate with this route.

name.description: Name of the static route. Only name and tag can be modified after configuring the route.

tag.description: Tag that can be used to filter redistribution of this route via route-maps. Only name and tag can be modified after configuring the route.

bfd_ip_address.description: Enable BFD for Static Route. This field is applicable for Lava and Bolt platforms only. Specify the local source ip address for BFD when the route mode is IRM_GATEWAY. Specify the destination ip address for BFD when the route mode is IRM_VLAN.

logging.description: Specify if the packets received on the route need to be logged, when the route mode is IRM_BLACK_HOLE. This is applicable for Lava and Bolt platforms only.
